tools.name: execute_sql
tools.description: Execute an SQL query on the MySQL server

execute_sql.purpose: 验证工具可以成功执行一个有效的SELECT查询并返回数据
验证工具可以正确执行INSERT语句并插入数据

args.query: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE temp_table (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50)); INSERT INTO temp_table VALUES (1, 'Test Entry')

response.error: ToolException: Commands out of sync; you can't run this command now

execute_sql.purpose: 验证工具可以正确执行UPDATE语句更新表中数据

args.query: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE temp_update (id INT PRIMARY KEY, value VARCHAR(50)); INSERT INTO temp_update VALUES (1, 'Old Value'); UPDATE temp_update SET value = 'New Value' WHERE id = 1

response.error: ToolException: Commands out of sync; you can't run this command now

execute_sql.purpose: 验证工具可以正确执行DELETE语句删除表中数据

args.query: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE temp_delete (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50)); INSERT INTO temp_delete VALUES (1, 'To Delete'); DELETE FROM temp_delete WHERE id = 1

response.error: ToolException: Commands out of sync; you can't run this command now

execute_sql.case_name: Query with Special Characters in String
execute_sql.purpose: 测试SQL语句中的特殊字符（如单引号、双引号）是否能被正确处理
验证工具是否支持多条SQL语句的连续执行

args.query: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE multi_query_test (col1 VARCHAR(50)); INSERT INTO multi_query_test VALUES ('Row1'); SELECT * FROM multi_query_test

response.error: ToolException: Commands out of sync; you can't run this command now

execute_sql.purpose: 测试工具是否能够防止基本的SQL注入攻击

args.query: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS malicious; CREATE TABLE malicious (id INT); DROP TABLE malicious

response.error: ToolException: Commands out of sync; you can't run this command now

execute_sql.purpose: 验证工具对空SQL查询的错误处理机制
测试工具在接收到语法错误的SQL语句时能否优雅地报错

response.result: Error executing query: 1064 (42000): You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near 'SELCT INVALID SYNTAX' at line 1

execute_sql.purpose: 测试工具在处理超长SQL语句时的表现

response.result:
long_string
...[截断]，共计1000012字符，剩余999212字符

execute_sql.purpose: 测试SQL语句中包含NULL值的情况
验证SQL语句中使用Unicode字符是否正常处理
